branchCategory.name: Safety Pressure Relief Valves
branchCategory.description: <p>Special versions of the VP and VG series valves that conform to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 to 4. They are available as dual residual pressure release safety valves with detection of main valve position.</p>

branchItem.name: VP/VG Residual Pressure Release ISO Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Special versions of the VP and VG series valves that conform to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 to 4. They are available as dual residual pressure release safety valves with detection of main valve position.</p>
